translation.ja: NETFLIX プレゼンツ マーマデューク

translation.en: [narrator] Once upon a time, there lived a very large and very sad doggy.
translation.ja: 昔々 とても気の毒な 大型犬がいた

translation.en: His family got mad at him just for being himself.
translation.ja: 自分らしくいただけで 家族に怒られ

translation.en: They locked him away in a high tower just so he couldn't join Billy's birthday party.
translation.ja: ビリーの誕生会から 締め出されちまったんだ

translation.en: No one said it was easy being a dog.
You can't ban me from Billy's party. It won't be a party without me.
translation.ja: 俺がいなきゃ 誕生会は盛り上がらない

translation.en: [man] Gather round, boys and girls, and watch this! [King Tut] Hmm.
translation.ja: さあ みんな よく見てなさい
ありがとう マーマデュークは？

translation.en: [Billy] Uh, he's up in my room being punished.
translation.ja: 僕の部屋でお仕置き中だ

translation.en: I'm having so much fun watching your brother's lame party.
translation.ja: あなたの弟の誕生会 ダサくて笑える

translation.en: [Billy] Let's see how high we can jump.
Oh, Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil! Phil!
translation.ja: フィル フィル フィル フィル

translation.en: You know I can say your name 76,345 times in a row.
translation.ja: 君の名前は 何万回でも呼べるぞ
そこで じっとしてろ マーマデューク

translation.en: Dad, why can't Marmaduke join the party?
Billy, he's got to stay up there until he learns his lesson.
translation.ja: ビリー 反省するまではダメだ

translation.en: Phil, don't you think you're being too hard on poor Marmaduke?
translation.ja: そこまで厳しくしなくても

translation.en: He's gone too far, Dottie. Maybe we need to enroll Marmaduke in obedience school.
translation.ja: あいつは暴れすぎだ しつけ教室に入れるべきかな

translation.en: Phil can't be mad at me for being a dog.
translation.ja: 犬なんてヤンチャなもんだろ

translation.en: All dogs like to chase cats.
translation.ja: 犬なら猫くらい追うさ

translation.en: [Marmaduke] No dog can resist a fresh bone.
translation.ja: 新鮮な骨にも食いつく

translation.en: [Marmaduke] One man's trash is another dog's treasure.
[Marmaduke] It's Phil's favorite chair, but he knows we like to wrestle over it.
translation.ja: フィルの椅子で レスリングするのも大好きだ

translation.en: Fine. You want to play hardball?
translation.ja: とことん罰する気だな

translation.en: -[marching band music playing] -I will march in protest! -I'll call my senator! -[drum thumping]
translation.ja: 抗議デモをするぞ 上院議員に訴えよう

translation.en: I want justice, and I want it now!
-I won't rest for one second! -[music stops]

translation.ja: おっと ベッドがあるな

translation.en: Here you go, sir. Perfect temperature. Just the way you like it.
translation.ja: さあ どうぞ お好みの温度に仕上げました

translation.en: Oh, you picked the wrong day, you buzzy little--
translation.ja: 今日の俺は機嫌が悪いんだ

translation.en: Oh, look. The life of the party.
-I hope my makeup doesn't run! -[kids scream]
This is the best party ever!
We have to do something about Marmaduke.
translation.ja: 何とか しつけないと

translation.en: Okay. I admit it. He's a handful.
translation.ja: そうね　確かに困った子だわ

translation.en: Maybe obedience school isn't such a bad idea.
translation.ja: しつけ教室は悪くないかも

translation.en: Susie’s video of Marmaduke has gone viral! There's over a million hits!
translation.ja: マーマデュークの動画が 100万回以上 再生された

translation.en: Definitely time to find that obedience school.
This "Pool Flop Fail" video is unbelievable!
translation.ja: この動画は 本当にクレイジーだわ この動画は 本当にクレイジーだわ 〝プールにドボン〞

translation.en: That furry rebel without a clue is totally out of control.
translation.ja: 〝プールにドボン〞 とんでもなく暴れん坊な ワンちゃんね

translation.en: A dog like this is impossible to train,
translation.ja: この子のしつけは不可能よ

translation.en: even for the world's greatest dog trainer…
translation.ja: 世界一の訓練士 ガイ･ヒルトンでもね 世界一の訓練士 ガイ･ヒルトンでもね 〝世界制覇 ６回〞
世界一の訓練士 ガイ･ヒルトンでもね 〝世界制覇 ６回〞

translation.en: Guy won the last six World Dog Championships in a row.
translation.ja: 〝世界制覇 ６回〞 彼は６年連続 世界大会を制したけど 彼は６年連続 世界大会を制したけど

translation.en: -[chuckles] Hmm? -But will not compete again until he finds a worthy challenge.
translation.ja: 価値ある挑戦を見つけるまで 次の出場はないそうよ

translation.en: Well, Guy, here it is. Train an impossible dog.
translation.ja: ガイ しつけ不可能な犬を 訓練してみるのはどう？
この私に不可能などない

translation.en: I will show the world that I can train any dog.
translation.ja: どんな犬も訓練できると 世界に示してやる
〝マーマデュークに 会おう〞 おい これ見ろよ

translation.en: step right up to see the Eighth Wonder of the World!
translation.ja: ご注目ください 世界８番目の不思議
マーマデュークだ マーマデュークだ 〝写真 ２枚目は半額〞

translation.en: [teenage boy] Oh my God. It's really him!
translation.ja: 〝写真 ２枚目は半額〞 〝写真 ２枚目は半額〞 マジかよ　本物だ

translation.en: Now, remember, this is a celebrity dog.
So take your pictures, only pet him once, and--
translation.ja: 写真をどうぞ なでるのは１回だよ
ほら さっさとして

translation.en: I don't want you drawing attention to that embarrassing doggy flop video.
translation.ja: あんな不名誉な動画で 注目を集めるな あんな不名誉な動画で 注目を集めるな 〝写真 １ドル〞

translation.en: I can't let my son charge kids from the neighborhood to meet our dog.
translation.ja: 息子に犬で稼がせるなんて

translation.en: What kinda father would that make me?
You can have 10% of all profits.
translation.ja: 利益の１割はパパに渡す

translation.en: All right, you guys! Marmaduke has a conference call with a big Hollywood producer coming up.
translation.ja: みんな マーマデュークは 映画の打ち合わせがあるんだ
だから急いで 次の人！

translation.en: [Marmaduke] I need hair and makeup over here.
[Guy] ♪ Oh, I want that doggy Yes, right now ♪
translation.ja: 今すぐ あの犬が欲しい

translation.en: ♪ I don’t want a cat that goes meow ♪
♪ I don’t want a bird or a fat old cow ♪
translation.ja: 鳥も太った老牛もお断り

translation.en: ♪ I want that doggy now ♪ ♪ ‘Cause I’ll be famous Oh wow ♪
translation.ja: あの犬を手に入れて 　　　　　有名になるぞ

translation.en: -[tires screeching] - ♪ I want that dog somehow ♪ I’ll get him right now
translation.ja: 何としても 　　あの犬を手に入れてやる

translation.en: So of all the dogs in the world, you wanna train Marmaduke to become the next World Champion?
translation.ja: マーマデュークを訓練して 次の世界王者にするって？

translation.en: After I won last year's World Championship,
translation.ja: 去年 世界を制した時

translation.en: I said I wouldn't train another dog until I found a worthy challenge.
translation.ja: 価値ある挑戦が見つかるまで 身を引くと決めた
これを見た 〝マーマデュークに 会おう〞

translation.en: Do you really think he's got the pedigree and winning form of a world champion?
translation.ja: 〝マーマデュークに 会おう〞 あいつは世界王者に なれるような血統の犬？ あいつは世界王者に なれるような血統の犬？

translation.en: -[Phil] So you want to train Marmaduke… -Mmm. …because he's a complete mess?
translation.ja: ひどい犬だから訓練したい？

translation.en: He's the challenge that I've been looking for. [chomps] Huh?
translation.ja: こういう難題に 挑みたかったんだ

translation.en: -Look. -[chomps] I have black belts… -[chomps] -…in multiple disciplines.
translation.ja: いいですか 私はあらゆる分野を極めた

translation.en: I have a PhD in animal training technology and hold 33 patents.
translation.ja: 動物訓練技術の博士号に加え 33個の特許も持ってる

translation.en: I am also the only person to ever win the World Dog Championship
translation.ja: そして６年連続で 世界犬選手権を制した 唯一の訓練士だ
世界犬選手権を制した 唯一の訓練士だ

translation.en: I can turn your dog into a champion.
translation.ja: 私なら あなたの犬をも 世界王者にできる

translation.en: It would be nice for Marmaduke to learn how to obey the rules, but…
translation.ja: マーマデュークに ルールは教えたいけど
ちょっと話が大げさだわ

translation.en: The winning dog receives the title of World Champion, but, more importantly, you'll earn the respect…
translation.ja: 優勝した犬は 世界一の称号を手にし
飼い主は 愛犬家たちの尊敬の的となる

translation.en: the winner receives one million dollars.

translation.ja: やる 少し考えるわ

translation.en: Every dog just needs the proper training to bring out their inner champion.
translation.ja: 内に眠る王者を適切な訓練で 呼び覚ますのです

translation.en: Okay, but I don't want my baby to suffer.
translation.ja: でも あの子を 苦しめたくないわ
マーマデュークの中にも 王者はいる

translation.en: It's just covered up in that.
translation.ja: 今は隠れてるんだ あの図体(ずうたい)に

translation.en: It's a dog-eat-dog world, Guy Hilton.
translation.ja: この世は食うか食われるか

translation.en: And you are about to show the world just how hungry you are.
translation.ja: 私のハングリー精神を この世に示してやるぞ

translation.en: Sure could use my trusty steed to track down Black Bart.
translation.ja: 忠実な馬に乗り ブラック･バートを追うぞ
ブラック･バートが逃げる

translation.en: [King Tut] Here we go again. The good, the bad, and the clueless.
translation.ja: かかってきやがれ 夕陽のガンマンめ

translation.en: -[Marmaduke] Move it or lose it, cowboy! -[horse neighs]
Guy Hilton is our only hope. [sighs]
[Marmaduke] Hey, that doormat looks like Phil.
Hmm. You are no longer Marmaduke.
translation.ja: もうマーマデュークではない
今のお前はただの犬だ

translation.en: Uh! Whoa! Hey, man! That's my tag!
translation.ja: 今のお前はただの犬だ タグを外すなよ

translation.en: You will stop all bad habits.
translation.ja: 悪い習慣は全てやめろ
悪い習慣は全てやめろ メチャクチャだな

translation.en: It’s time you forget everything you've ever known.
translation.ja: これまでの知識を 全て消し去るんだ
落ち着けよ イカれ男さん

translation.en: You must earn the right to get your name back.
translation.ja: 己の力で名前を取り戻せ

translation.en: you must become strong enough to do the impossible!
translation.ja: 不可能を可能にする強さが 必要なんだ

translation.en: Uh, all right. That's it. I've had enough. I'm outa here.
translation.ja: もういい　帰らせてもらうよ

translation.en: There's a stack of French toast with Billy's name on it that I'm about to-- -[Guy grunts] -[Marmaduke] Whoa!
translation.ja: ビリーのフレンチトーストが 余ってたから…

translation.en: You will leave when I tell you.
If you don't get out of my way, I'm gonna have to unleash
translation.ja: 邪魔するなら戦わせてもらう

translation.en: Puddin's, uh, not much of a fighter.
translation.ja: プリンは強くないけど

translation.en: You might wanna close your eyes, Puddin'.
translation.ja: 目を閉じてろ プリン

translation.en: [grunts] You can't push me around, jerk!
translation.ja: ナメるなよ クソ野郎

translation.en: You must be prepared for any and all situations.
translation.ja: あらゆる状況に 備えなきゃダメだ
そこにない― キックにも
本当の訓練は明日からだ

translation.en: Wait! We just started training. You have to show me that trick.
translation.ja: まだ始めたばかりだろ 技を教えてくれ
おかえり 忠実な馬

translation.en: I heard Black Bart's been rustlin' around these parts.
translation.ja: 牛泥棒のブラック･バートを 捕まえよう
訓練でクタクタなんだ

translation.en: You know I can't say no when you do that face.
translation.ja: その顔をされると断れない

translation.en: Marmaduke doesn't have time to play cowboy. He's in training.
translation.ja: マーマデュークは 訓練で忙しいんだ

translation.en: But I hardly even saw him today.
translation.ja: 今日はずっと留守だった

translation.en: That's because he's working very hard to get ready for the dog show.
translation.ja: ドッグショーに向けて 準備中でな

translation.en: Who cares about some stupid dog show?
translation.ja: ドッグショーなんて知らない

translation.en: Billy will be fine. Come on, boy.
translation.ja: ビリーは平気さ　来い

translation.en: Oh. Okay, this is where we both jump for the couch and have that big fight
translation.ja: ソファを奪い合って 戦うわけだな

translation.en: that ends in manly bear hugs.
Get some rest. Tomorrow's a big day.
translation.ja: もう休め　明日は大変だぞ

translation.en: You're just gonna let me have it.
translation.ja: 黙ってソファを譲るのか

translation.en: [Marmaduke] Man, what do you have against sleep?
With the help of my newest robotech training system,
translation.ja: ロボテック訓練システムを 使って

translation.en: I will turn you into a champion.
translation.ja: お前を王者にしてやる お前を王者にしてやる 〝ロボテック ＧＨ３０００〞

translation.en: You will learn the proper way to stand and walk
translation.ja: 適切な立ち方や歩き方 適切な立ち方や歩き方 〝グレートデン〞

translation.en: and learn to control your impulse to eat.
translation.ja: 〝服従訓練〞 食欲の抑え方などを 学ぶんだ 食欲の抑え方などを 学ぶんだ

translation.en: [Guy] And you will train on different obstacles
translation.ja: さまざまな障害物で 王者の俊敏性も養うぞ さまざまな障害物で 王者の俊敏性も養うぞ 〝障害物訓練〞

translation.en: until you have the speed and agility of a champion.
translation.ja: さまざまな障害物で 王者の俊敏性も養うぞ 〝障害物訓練〞

translation.en: [Guy] You must control your impulse to eat.
translation.ja: 食べたくても我慢だぞ
かわいい俺を死なせるな

translation.en: [Marmaduke grunts] There's no reason to start so early.
-[Marmaduke] The sun isn't even up. -[Guy straining]
[Marmaduke] Oh, why am I doing this? I'm gonna get chopped in half!
-[grunts] -Let's see how well you play with fire.
We did it! We did it! [laughs gleefully] We did it!

translation.ja: もうただの犬じゃない
お前はマーマデュークだ
君もただの男(ガイ)じゃない

translation.en: You're Guy, you know? With, like, a capital G.
translation.ja: 最高のガイさ　唯一無二のね

translation.en: Tomorrow, you enter your first competition.
translation.ja: 明日は初めての大会に出るぞ

translation.en: [Barbara] Why is Dad out shopping for a new car?
translation.ja: なぜパパは車を買いに？

translation.en: Because he thinks Marmaduke is gonna make us rich.
translation.ja: マーマデュークが 大金を稼ぐって

translation.en: Billy, stop saying true things about your father.
translation.ja: パパの思惑を言い当てないで

translation.en: Why? All he cares about is the prize money.
translation.ja: パパは賞金にしか興味がない

translation.en: Mom, if Marmaduke wins, can I get a pony?
translation.ja: 優勝したらポニーを買える？

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to the County Dog Show!
translation.ja: 〝郡ドッグショー〞 ドッグショーへようこそ 〝郡ドッグショー〞

translation.en: And now, I'd like to introduce Henri and Philippe!
translation.ja: 〝郡ドッグショー〞 それではアンリと フィリップの登場です それではアンリと フィリップの登場です それではアンリと フィリップの登場です 〝きらきらシャンプー〞

translation.en: And now, ladies and gentlemen, the dog you've all been waiting for.
translation.ja: 皆さん お待ちかねの犬を ご紹介します

translation.en: Come on, people. Don't be shy.
Come on up and take a close look at the future World Champion.
translation.ja: 未来の世界王者を 近くで見るといい

translation.en: Look how beautiful Shimmer Shampoo makes Zeus's hair, no?
translation.ja: きらきらシャンプーの効果を 見てください

translation.en: That is the best-looking dog I've ever seen!
translation.ja: 今まで見た中で 最高にキレイな犬だわ

translation.en: That's just the lights from the-- Oh! Ah!
Okay, that's the fur. That is the fur.
translation.ja: 確かに毛並みが 輝いてるようだな
見た目が全てじゃない

translation.en: Wait, what's that supposed to mean?
And don't forget to take advantage of our two-for-one offer for Shimmer Shampoo.
translation.ja: 今なら半額です きらきらシャンプーをどうぞ

translation.en: Guaranteed to turn your dog into a dream… -[Philippe chuckles] -…like the Zeus.
translation.ja: あなたの犬も ゼウスのように美しくなる
高級シャンプーを使ってれば 輝いてて当然さ

translation.en: [Marmaduke] He uses name-brand shampoo. I use soap.
translation.ja: 高級シャンプーを使ってれば 輝いてて当然さ 俺なんて食器用洗剤だぞ
俺なんて食器用洗剤だぞ

translation.en: Mom, can I use Shimmer Shampoo?
translation.ja: これ 僕も使いたい

translation.en: Don't be silly. You're not using dog shampoo. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 犬用のシャンプーなんて 使っちゃダメよ
超特別ねえ　あっそ
いいですか 皆さん

translation.en: Come out to the big show and see the next World Dog Champion!
translation.ja: 大会も見てくださいね 次期世界王者も出ますよ

translation.en: And don't forget to take advantage of our two-for-one offer for the Shimmer Shampoo!
translation.ja: シャンプーは今なら ２本が１本の値段ですよ

translation.en: Handmade by me and my brother.
Come to buy some shampoo, fleabag?
translation.ja: シャンプーを買うのか？ クズ犬

translation.en: Or did you just want to see what a champion looks like up close?
translation.ja: 近くで王者を 見たかっただけかな

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna be a champion too.
translation.ja: 俺も王者になるんだぜ

translation.en: Okay. First of all, ah, I'm going to be the next World Champion.
translation.ja: そうかい 次の世界王座を 手にするのは俺だぞ

translation.en: Second of all, the only thing you're going to win is
translation.ja: お前が勝ち得るものなど ただ１つ

translation.en: total humiliation for you and your family.
translation.ja: お前と家族がかく恥だけだ

translation.en: Congratulations, Marmaduke. You're all signed up for your first dog show.
translation.ja: マーマデューク 初の大会にエントリーしたぞ
このかわい子ちゃんは？

translation.en: Oh, I hope this disguise works and no one recognizes me.
translation.ja: 変装がバレないといいな

translation.en: Come on, we have to get ready for the competition.
translation.ja: さあ 準備に向かうぞ

translation.en: Today, you'll show them all that you are a champion.
translation.ja: お前が王者だと 見せつけてやれ
〝シャーペイ〞 〝シャーペイ〞 どうも

translation.en: So many new friends to talk to.
translation.ja: 新しい友達がいっぱいだ
すごいな 俺だけのスペース？ すごいな 俺だけのスペース？ 〝マーマデューク〞
すごいな 俺だけのスペース？ 〝マーマデューク〞

translation.en: You belong here. -You have to believe you're a winner. -Huh? [grunts]
translation.ja: ここはお前のシマだ 勝者だと自信を持て

translation.en: -[warbles] -Stay put while I find out when we're up.
translation.ja: 待ってろ 出番を確認してくる

translation.en: Believe you're a winner. Got it. No problem.
translation.ja: 自分は勝者だと 自信を持つんだな

translation.en: I'm a winner. I'm a winner. I'm a winner.
translation.ja: 俺は勝者だ　勝者だぞ
マジかよ　ゼウスか

translation.en: Okay, okay. Act cool. Just ignore him, and he won't bother you.
translation.ja: 問題ないさ あんなヤツは無視しよう
ゼウスか　うれしいな

translation.en: -It was so great to meet you earlier. -[sighs]
translation.ja: さっきは会えて光栄だった

translation.en: Hey, buddy. I just wanted to apologize for how I acted earlier.
translation.ja: さっきは失礼な態度を取って すまなかったね

translation.en: But did… did… did you just apologize?
I spent the whole day on that lousy stage taking pictures and… -I just lost it. -[woman] Oh! Oh no!
translation.ja: ずっと騒々しい中で 写真を撮られてイラついてた

translation.en: Us show dogs have to stick together, bro-bro.
translation.ja: 出場犬同士 仲良くしよう 相棒よ
そうだな 相棒さん

translation.en: I can tell I need to earn your trust. Let me show you something.
translation.ja: 信頼を得るために あるものを見せよう

translation.en: Now, there's a well-known secret about every single dog show.
translation.ja: ドッグショーには 有名な秘密がある

translation.en: Nobody comes here for stupid little trophies or fancy ribbons.
translation.ja: 誰もトロフィー目当てに 大会なんて出ない
誰もトロフィー目当てに 大会なんて出ない 出場する目的は…
〝表彰の宴〞 ごちそうさ 〝表彰の宴〞

translation.en: [Marmaduke] It's… it's a… I don't… I can't…
translation.ja: 〝表彰の宴〞 何てこった　これは…

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. I'm okay. I'm okay. Just… just gimme a sec, all right? It's so beautiful.
translation.ja: ああ 大丈夫さ ただ豪華すぎて驚いた

translation.en: But we're not supposed to eat a large meal before a competition.
translation.ja: 大会前に大食いしちゃダメだ

translation.en: A large meal before a competition is exactly what you need.
translation.ja: 大会前だからこそ 大食いが必要なのさ

translation.en: We don't have much time, so dig in.
translation.ja: 時間がないぞ　早く食おう

translation.en: Okay, I'm in. But just a tiny taste. [exhales]
translation.ja: 分かった　でも少しだけだぞ

translation.en: I gotta rush and get highlight touch-ups. I'll see you in five.
translation.ja: 俺は毛を仕上げてくるよ また後でな

translation.en: [announcer] All contestants please report to the main stage.
translation.ja: 出場犬は皆 メインステージへ
おなかいっぱい　大満足だ

translation.en: [announcer] All contestants please report to the main stage.
translation.ja: 出場犬は皆 メインステージへ

translation.en: [announcer] The dog show competition is starting. All contestants must get ready.
translation.ja: 大会が始まります 出場犬は準備してください

translation.en: [groaning] I can't believe I ate the whole thing.
translation.ja: 全部 食べちまったよ

translation.en: Don't worry. I was just checking my blood sugar.
translation.ja: 血糖を整えてただけさ

translation.en: Now, remember, float around the perimeter.
translation.ja: 舞うように歩くんだぞ
このくらい何てことな…

translation.en: That's it. I'm never smelling a dog's rear end again.
translation.ja: 最悪だ 二度と犬のケツは嗅がないぞ

translation.en: What happened to you? Did you swallow the Goodyear Blimp?
translation.ja: 飛行船でも のみ込んだのか？

translation.en: Whoa! He looks like me after Taco Tuesday.
translation.ja: まるでタコスを 爆食いした時の私だ
無理なんだ　本当だぞ

translation.en: [Zeus] How was your snack? -You look a bit bloated. [chuckles] -[grunting nervously]
translation.ja: うまかったか？ 腹がパンパンだな

translation.en: I… I'm fine, thank you. I… I just have to…

translation.ja: 行くぞ マーマデューク

translation.en: [panting] It's too far. I'm not gonna make it.
translation.ja: 遠すぎる　我慢できないよ

translation.en: -Ah. I can do it. I can do it. -[tires screeching]
translation.ja: よし あれを使おう

translation.en: -[man] What is that? -[kid] Oh my God!
I’ve never seen anything more embarrassing in all my life!
translation.ja: あれほど屈辱的な光景は 見たことがない

translation.en: I can't believe I thought you had a shot at greatness.
translation.ja: お前が王者になれるなどと 思った私がバカだったよ
おめでとう フィル

translation.en: You've discovered a new breed of dog.
translation.ja: 新たな犬種を発見したね
落ちこぼれ(ノットグレート)デンだ

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Billy] It's okay, boy. You don't have to do this anymore.
translation.ja: 安心して もう大会には出なくていい
〝また来てね〞 これで終わりだ
気をつけて　悪臭女よ

translation.en: She shares a home with Scooby Poo!

translation.ja: お前の犬 マジで汚いな

translation.en: Say something nice to your dog.
You are who you are, Marmaduke.
Oh, Phil means well, but he's not really good at the old pick-me-up speech.
translation.ja: 慰めたつもりだろうが フィルは励ますのが苦手だな

translation.en: Oh, come on. It's not that big a deal. So you lost the dog show competition.
translation.ja: 落ち込むことはないさ ドッグショーで負けただけだ

translation.en: I lost it in the championship trophy in front of 500 people.
translation.ja: 500人の前で トロフィーに粗相したんだ

translation.en: Do you have any idea how humiliating that is?
-Then I got my butt stuck in the trophy. -[inhales sharply] And tt took two security guards to get it out!
translation.ja: トロフィーに尻が詰まって ２人がかりで出してもらった

translation.en: Well, that's a memory the dog show crowd will cherish for the rest of their lives.
translation.ja: 観客たちには いい思い出になっただろう

translation.en: Probably best if you lay low for a while. This will all blow over.
translation.ja: おとなしくしてれば 今にほとぼりが冷めるさ

translation.en: And I always thought Dad would be the reason why I had no friends in school.
translation.ja: 友達がいないのは パパのせいだと思ってた

translation.en: Some dogs are meant to be champions.
translation.ja: 王者になれる犬もいれば―

translation.en: Some dogs are meant to be… dogs.
translation.ja: 普通の犬でしかない犬もいる
厄介で不器用で 行儀の悪い犬よ

translation.en: Mom's right. The whole thing is unfortunate.
translation.ja: 今回の件は残念だったが

translation.en: But the best thing we can do is put the whole thing behind us.
translation.ja: 忘れて前に進むのが一番だ

translation.en: Guy wants us to pay for the training costs.
translation.ja: ガイから訓練費の請求が

translation.en: It was supposed to come out of the prize money
translation.ja: 賞金で払うはずだった

translation.en: [Dottie] Oh, honey. It's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 泣かないで　大丈夫よ

translation.en: [Dottie] Kids, some dogs are meant to be champions.
translation.ja: 王者になれる犬もいれば―

translation.en: Some dogs are meant to be… dogs.
translation.ja: 普通の犬でしかない犬もいる

translation.en: [Zeus] The only thing you're going to win
translation.ja: お前が勝ち得るものなど ただ１つ

translation.en: is total humiliation for you and your family.
translation.ja: お前と家族がかく恥だけだ

translation.en: [Phil] He's gone too far, Dottie. Maybe we need to enroll Marmaduke in obedience school.
translation.ja: あいつは暴れすぎだ しつけ教室に入れるべきかな

translation.en: [Guy] You've discovered a new breed of dog,
translation.ja: 新たな犬種を発見したね
落ちこぼれ(ノットグレート)デンだ

translation.en: They’ll be better off without me.
What were you doing out there?
[King Tut] I knew I wasn’t in any danger
because you’ll do whatever it takes to make sure that the whole family is safe and sound.
translation.ja: 何があっても お前が全力で 家族を守ってくれるからな

translation.en: Tell that to Billy and Barbara.
translation.ja: ビリーたちにも言って

translation.en: [King Tut] Nobody wins their first competition.
translation.ja: 初出場で優勝は無理さ

translation.en: You just need to go back out there and make things right.
translation.ja: また挑戦して やり直せばいいだけだ

translation.en: Are you kidding? All that training?
Guy was right. -There is a champion inside of you. -[soft piano music playing]
translation.ja: ガイの言ったとおり お前の中には王者がいる
その王者が 俺を助けてくれたのさ

translation.en: I'm the greatest dog of all time.
[King Tut] I wouldn't go that far, but top five million for sure.
translation.ja: それは言いすぎだが 上位500万には入る
戻ったぞ　訓練しよう
何だよ お前か あのな

translation.en: It was unfair for me to think that you had what it takes to be a champion.
translation.ja: お前が王者になれるなんて 勘違いだった
王者は不可能を可能にするが

translation.en: But all you’ve done is made it impossible to be a champion.
translation.ja: お前は王者になることを 不可能にしただけ
さっさと帰れ 犬コロ

translation.en: I'll show you what a real champion can do.
translation.ja: 真の王者の実力を見せてやる

translation.en: This amazing dog has just done the impossible
translation.ja: この天才犬は 不可能を可能にし

translation.en: and made a solo trip around the world.
translation.ja: １匹で世界一周に成功したわ

translation.en: [reporter] We're also getting reports that this mysterious dog
translation.ja: この謎の犬は 万里の長城も越えたそうで

translation.en: traversed the Great Wall, and was also spotted crossing--
translation.ja: この謎の犬は 万里の長城も越えたそうで 目撃情報は他にも…
チャンスが欲しいんだな

translation.en: Well, I gave him a chance, and he failed.
translation.ja: すでに与えたが失敗しただろ

translation.en: I was wrong. There's no champion inside of him.
translation.ja: こいつの中には 王者などいない
ムダだから もう帰ってくれ

translation.en: If you don't get off my lawn, I'll call the cops.
translation.ja: 帰らないと警察を呼ぶぞ

translation.en: Because it appears somebody stole your integrity.
translation.ja: 誠実さを 泥棒されたみたいだしね

translation.en: You're the one that told Marmaduke you'd turn him into a world champion.
translation.ja: あんたが王者にしてやると 言ったんだろ

translation.en: [man] That's right. Tell him how it is!
-But if there's a failure in this story… -[man] Tell him. …it's you!
translation.ja: 失敗したのは あんただ

translation.en: Nobody's ever called me a failure.
translation.ja: 初めて失敗者扱いされた

translation.en: My point is that I like what the boy said about me being a failure.
translation.ja: 失敗しただなんて言われて 新鮮な気分だよ

translation.en: Never accepting failure. Never giving up.
translation.ja: 失敗には屈しない 諦めないぞ

translation.en: That is how you make the impossible possible.
translation.ja: そして不可能を 可能にするんだ

translation.en: And that is what made me the greatest dog trainer the world has ever seen!
translation.ja: そうやって私は 史上最高の犬訓練士になれた

translation.en: Thank you for calling me a failure!
translation.ja: 失敗を指摘してくれて ありがとう

translation.en: You reminded me of what I saw in your dog in the first place.
translation.ja: 君の犬に引かれた理由を 思い出したよ

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Oh, we're going to do great things.
translation.ja: すばらしい体験をしよう

translation.en: Pack your bags, because we're going to the World Dog Championship!
translation.ja: 荷造りをして 世界犬選手権に行くぞ

translation.en: Well, I think Marmaduke has his trainer back.
translation.ja: マーマデュークに 訓練士が戻った

translation.en: Nobody can annoy somebody into doing something they don't wanna do like my dog.
translation.ja: うちの犬は人を困らせて 無理強いする天才ね

translation.en: Yep. That's kinda always been my motto.
translation.ja: それが俺のモットーさ

translation.en: [Barbara] Yay! Marmaduke! You did it! I love you!
translation.ja: マーマデューク 愛してる
あら ガイ･ヒルトンね

translation.en: I have a favor to ask the President of the World Dog Championship.
translation.ja: 世界犬選手権の責任者に お願いがあるんだ

translation.en: I want to bring a rookie -to this year’s competition. -[giggles]
translation.ja: 今年の大会に 新しい犬を出したい

translation.en: And don't make any dinner plans
translation.ja: 夕食の予定は入れないで

translation.en: because I'm taking you to that cozy place we went to last time.
translation.ja: 前に行ったステキな店に また連れていきたい

translation.en: [Billy] Oh, I hope Dad buys a car like this!
translation.ja: こんな車を買ってほしいな

translation.en: [Marmaduke] My stomach is bubbling, and that never ends well.
translation.ja: おなかの調子が悪い マズい展開だ

translation.en: -Okay. Don't be nervous, buddy. -[groans] It's just a dog show.
translation.ja: 緊張するな ただのドッグショーだ

translation.en: [in Spanish accent] What is that delicious smell?
[in French accent] This humidity is not doing my coat any favors.
translation.ja: 湿気がすごくて コートに悪いわ

translation.en: [in British accent] Give us another chop, eh?
If we are true to ourselves, then we have already won.
translation.ja: 自分に正直でいれば すでに勝者だ

translation.en: So which of these mangy mutts is fighting for second place?
translation.ja: どのアホどもが２位争いを？

translation.en: [man] Can I get a picture of the greatest of all time?
translation.ja: 史上最高の犬を撮りたい

translation.en: Are we sure these are all dogs?
I mean, that one has two rear ends.
translation.ja: ヤツは前後に尻が 〝スノーボール〞

translation.en: How does a dog get muscles like that?
There you go, sunshine. [chuckles] There you go.
translation.ja: ここにあるぞ 飲め

translation.en: Hey, Guy, where's my protein shake?
I'm not good in social situations. It gives me really bad gas.
translation.ja: 俺は社交場が苦手なんだ 腹が痛くなる

translation.en: Thanks for making this happen at the last minute.
translation.ja: 急な頼みだったのに ありがとう

translation.en: Of course. I was glad you called.
translation.ja: 電話もらえて うれしかった

translation.en: It's really good to see you.
translation.ja: 君に会えて うれしい

translation.en: I'd love to chat, but I've got to get back to my office now.
translation.ja: 話したいけど オフィスに戻らなきゃ

translation.en: Are we still on for dinner?
[Amy] You do owe me a dinner.
[in French accent] I haven't seen you around.

translation.ja: ああ まあね こういう世界には 足を踏み入れたばかりだ

translation.en: I… I'm… I'm… I'm kinda new to this stuff, so…
translation.ja: こういう世界には 足を踏み入れたばかりだ

translation.en: Juan, buddy, you call that a scarf?
translation.ja: フアン それはスカーフかい？

translation.en: I thought it was a dishrag.
translation.ja: ただの布巾かと思ったよ

translation.en: Ooh, better cut back on the strudel.
Your belly's starting to drag on the floor.
translation.ja: 腹が床につきそうだぞ

translation.en: All the way from Shanghai just to lose to me? [laughs]
translation.ja: 俺に負けるために 上海から来たのか

translation.en: Choose your words wisely, Mr. Zeus.
translation.ja: 言葉は賢く選ばないと
自滅することになるぞ
そんなに心配しないで
お望みなら かむけど

translation.en: I never expected to see you again after what happened at the last dog show.
translation.ja: あんな経験をしたのに また出場するとはな

translation.en: You tricked me. You're a weasel.
translation.ja: よくも だましたな

translation.en: Look, do you really want to go out on the competition floor
translation.ja: それより本当に ステージに立つ気か？

translation.en: and embarrass yourself while the whole world is watching?
translation.ja: 全世界に向けて 恥をさらすことになるんだぞ

translation.en: The only embarrassment here is you and your overpriced shampoo.
translation.ja: お前と 高額シャンプーの方が恥だ

translation.en: Now, if you’ll excuse me, I have to prepare my victory speech.
translation.ja: じゃあ 失礼するよ 優勝スピーチを考える

translation.en: [reporter] Welcome to the World Dog Championship.
translation.ja: 世界犬選手権へようこそ

translation.en: There are always so many incredible stories at this show.
translation.ja: この大会には 逸話がつきものよ

translation.en: But topping my list is the return of the dog whisperer himself,
translation.ja: 中でも今回の目玉は 犬訓練の達人の復活ね

translation.en: Guy Hilton, here with the star of the "Pool Flop Fail,"
translation.ja: ガイ･ヒルトンが 〝プールにどぼん〞の マーマデュークと参戦よ
〝プールにどぼん〞の マーマデュークと参戦よ

translation.en: I mean, I wasn't ready to be born. I was born to be ready.
translation.ja: いや 生まれた時から 準備万全

translation.en: The simple answer is just yes.
This year is going to be a doozy.
translation.ja: 今年は面白くなりそうだね

translation.en: [announcer] Ah. And here they come in all their majesty.
translation.ja: 威厳ある犬たちが 登場してきましたよ
いけ マーマデューク

translation.en: [announcer] Looks like it's time to start the Obedience Section of the competition
translation.ja: まずは従順さを 競うコーナーです

translation.en: where the canine's self-control is tested with a baconized version of their favorite treat.
translation.ja: ベーコン入りの大好物で 犬たちの自制心が試されます

translation.en: Now, if I was a dog, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.ja: 〝フアン･ペドロ〞 私が犬だったら…

translation.en: and my wife might say there's no "if" about it…
translation.ja: 妻にとっては すでに犬だ

translation.en: …I… I would struggle during this part of the competition.
translation.ja: とにかく この課題は難関だ

translation.en: [in Spanish accent] My fans, they love me.
[announcer] Let's see if Juan Pedro can resist

translation.ja: ベーコンタコスに 耐えられるか？

translation.en: What a great idea! That's amazing. [licks lips]
translation.ja: 最高の組み合わせだね

translation.en: I love it! I love it!
translation.ja: いいぞ　気に入ったよ
フアン･ペドロ 我慢しなさい

translation.en: [announcer] The little guy is eyeballing that taco,
translation.ja: タコスを見つめてるぞ

translation.en: but the promise of the Championship trophy is way stronger than a--
translation.ja: だがトロフィーへの 思いの方が強いはず…

translation.en: Ay, ay, ay! He needs his medication!
translation.ja: 〝服従試験 失敗〞 大変　薬をあげなきゃ

translation.en: Looks like Juan Pedro has been disqualified.
translation.ja: フアン･ペドロは失格だ

translation.en: -[buzzer blares] -[trainer] No, it's not his fault!
-[mystical music playing] -The bacon is your enemy.
you have to become the bacon.
translation.ja: 君がベーコンになることだ

translation.en: You are a strange little dog.

translation.ja: ベーコン！　ベーコン！
絶対 食べちゃうわね

translation.en: Come on, boy. Don't be you!
translation.ja: 頑張れ　自分を出すな

translation.en: [whispering] Be the bacon. Come on, man. Be the bacon.
translation.ja: ベーコンになる 俺はベーコンだ

translation.en: [Marmaduke] Hey, you could've saved me a bite.
He wouldn't be able to resist Shantrelle.
translation.ja: 私のことなら 食べちゃってたわ

translation.en: [announcer] One of my favorite events is the Obstacle Course.
translation.ja: 次は私の大好きな 障害物コースだ
最初の挑戦者はゼウス！

translation.en: [announcer] And just like his namesake, Zeus crosses the finish line like a bolt of lightning.
translation.ja: ゼウスという名のとおり 稲妻のようなフィニッシュだ

translation.en: You got this. Just like we practiced.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　練習どおりにやれ

translation.en: Be the bacon, Marmaduke. You can do it.
Remember, when you fall flat on your stupid face,
translation.ja: 派手にシクじったって 気にするなよ

translation.en: nobody expected you to win anyway.
translation.ja: 最初から誰も お前に期待してない

translation.en: Be the bacon. The bacon! The… the bacon!
translation.ja: ベーコンになれ　ベーコンだ

translation.en: Oh! I can't believe I did it.
translation.ja: ウソだろ　ゴールしたのか

translation.en: In a crazy turn of events,
Guy Hilton's attempt to win the championship with a rookie dog
translation.ja: ルーキー犬と 優勝を目指したガイが

translation.en: has ended in a terrible injury.
Looks like this underdog landed under his dog.
translation.ja: 今大会の大穴(アンダードッグ)が 文字どおり犬の下敷きに

translation.en: [announcer] The talent show is about to begin.
Unfortunately, Marmaduke will not be competing due to Guy Hilton’s accident.
translation.ja: マーマデュークは ガイの負傷で棄権しました

translation.en: [Amy] Guy is at the hospital now.
I just wanted to let you know he's going to be fine.
I'm really sorry you won't be able to finish the show.
translation.ja: 最後まで挑めなくて残念ね

translation.en: I think your dog has a lot of heart.
translation.ja: あなたの犬は優しいわ

translation.en: I've gotta go get ready for the talent show. Take care.
translation.ja: 仕事に戻るわ　じゃあ

translation.en: I know you're sad right now.
But this is just like the time that Jeremy Smith told Kathy he was gonna ask me to the Spring Dance,
translation.ja: ダンス会に私を誘うと 言ってたジェレミーが

translation.en: but he ended up choosing Becky and I had to go with Mike.
translation.ja: 結局 ベッキーを 選んだ時みたい
今のは いい例えね バーバラ

translation.en: Should we just call a taxi and go home?
translation.ja: タクシーを呼んで帰る？

translation.en: The Winslows are a lot of things.
Bad golfers. Those neighbors who borrow tools and forget where they put them.
translation.ja: ゴルフが下手で 人に借りた物をなくす

translation.en: Always late for church. Inconsiderate drivers.
translation.ja: いつも教会に遅れ 運転マナーもひどい

translation.en: Marmaduke, you're not like those other dogs.
translation.ja: マーマデュークは 他の犬とは違う

translation.en: Some say you're too big. I say you're too big-hearted.
translation.ja: 人はお前を巨体だと言うが 心だってデカいぞ

translation.en: And I know the best dog in the whole world is staring me right in the face.
translation.ja: 間違いなく お前こそが この世で最高の犬だ

translation.en: [Phil] So, if you wanna finish what you started…
Then I think we can find you a new trainer.
translation.ja: 新しい訓練士をつけてやる

translation.en: -[Marmaduke] Get in there, Puddin'. -[Dottie] Silly dog.
We've reached the final event that decides which of these amazing specimens
translation.ja: 次が最後の戦いよ この名犬たちの中から

translation.en: will be named the greatest dog on earth and win the million-dollar prize!
translation.ja: 世界一の称号と100万ドルを 手にする犬が決まるわ

translation.en: Now to my favorite part, the talent show.
translation.ja: 私の大好きな特技ショーよ

translation.en: [announcer] First up, it’s Vinnie and Ronnie
translation.ja: まずはヴィニーとロニーです

translation.en: with their amazing display of the Staffordshire’s strength!
translation.ja: スタッフォードシャーの 怪力ぶりをご覧ください

translation.en: Wow! That is one strong dog.
translation.ja: 驚いたな 何てパワフルな犬なんだ

translation.en: Next up, it’s Shantrelle and her seductive Parisian extravaganza!
translation.ja: 次はシャントレル 魅惑の豪華ショーを 披露します

translation.en: [announcer] Get ready for Zhi and Fu’s spectacular blend
translation.ja: 次はジーとフーによる― 武道と神秘的な東洋の力の 融合をご覧ください

translation.en: of martial arts and the mystical powers of the East.
translation.ja: 武道と神秘的な東洋の力の 融合をご覧ください

translation.en: Wow, these dogs are putting on an amazing show. Yay!
Bu how did he land on the tip of that spear without getting skewered?
translation.ja: ヤリの先に乗っても 刺さらないとはね
次はゼウスとアンリです

translation.en: demonstrating the mesmerizing power of the Afghan’s sparkling fur!
translation.ja: アフガンハウンドの 魅惑的な毛並みをご覧あれ

translation.en: Look deeply into the golden fleece of my Zeus.
translation.ja: 黄金に輝くゼウスの毛に ご注目ください

translation.en: You are now in a trance.
translation.ja: みんなトランス状態に陥った
さあ ゼウスに従うのだ

translation.en: [crowd] Obey Zeus… Obey Zeus… Obey Zeus…
translation.ja: ゼウスに従う ゼウスに従う…

translation.en: [Henri] You will give Zeus the perfect score.
translation.ja: ゼウスに満点を与えるのだ
トランス状態 終了！

translation.en: Oh, uh… Wow, that was incredible!
translation.ja: 今のは すばらしかったね

translation.en: [announcer] Marmaduke is back in the competition with his new trainer, Team Winslow.
translation.ja: チーム･ウィンスローとして マーマデュークが復活

translation.en: Next up, Marmaduke and Billy take us back to the lawless days of the Wild West!
translation.ja: 相棒のビリーと共に 無法地帯だった頃の西部を 再現してくれます

translation.en: And I think Black Bart might be roamin' around these parts.
translation.ja: ブラック･バートが この辺りをウロついてる

translation.en: You can’t get away from us, Black Bart.
translation.ja: 逃げられると思うなよ
最高だ マーマデューク

translation.en: This is stupid. That isn't talent.
translation.ja: こんなもの特技ではない

translation.en: I can't believe you made it.
I wasn't gonna miss your big show.
translation.ja: お前の大舞台だからな

translation.en: You can take it from here, pal.

translation.ja: チーム･ウィンスローだ

translation.en: [Marmaduke] I mean, what's not to love?
[announcer] And now, the moment you’ve all been waiting for.
translation.ja: いよいよ お待ちかねの瞬間です

translation.en: -And this year's World Dog Champion is… -[drumroll]
translation.ja: 今年 世界一に輝いた犬は…
失せろ 負け犬ども

translation.en: I knew me quads would be me downfall.
translation.ja: 大腿(だいたい)四頭筋が不調だった

translation.en: At least I got to show the world what kind of dog I am.
translation.ja: 自分をアピールできたし 十分さ

translation.en: Oh, Zeus is so, so special.
I knew he was a cheater.
We can't let him get away with this.
translation.ja: 勝ち逃げは許さないぞ

translation.en: Who the heck is that guy? [chuckles nervously]
Huh? What are you guys doing?!
Hey! You got the wrong guy!
-And the new World Dog Champion is… -[drumroll]
This can't happen. That trophy's mine.
translation.ja: そんな トロフィーは俺のものだぞ

translation.en: The kick that isn't there. Good one, Marmaduke. [groans]
translation.ja: そこにないキックか　やるね

translation.en: I am going to rip those stupid floppy ears off your head!
translation.ja: そのバカみたいな耳を 引きちぎってやる
ビリー 俺が助ける
誰か 獣医を呼んで
お願い　目を覚まして
マーマデュークは いい犬だった

translation.en: Marmaduke never wanted to hurt anyone.
translation.ja: 誰かを傷つけようとは しなかった
猫を追いかけ回して 生け垣を破壊し

translation.en: Never passing up a good bone. Hogging my favorite chair.
translation.ja: うまい骨を逃さず 僕のソファを占領してたがね

translation.en: His heart was always in the right place.
translation.ja: いつだって 心は優しい犬だった

translation.en: We should never have tried to train you.
translation.ja: 訓練なんて不要だった

translation.en: -[machinery beeping] -You were perfect just the way you were.
translation.ja: そのままで完璧だったんだ

translation.en: Is there still time to hit the Awards Banquet?

translation.ja: マーマデューク 大好きよ

translation.en: -[security guard] Come on, you. -I'm the World Champion.
translation.ja: 来い 俺は世界王者なんだぞ
俺は世界王者なんだぞ

translation.en: Don't let the doggy flap hit you on the way out.
You are not like any dog I've ever met.
translation.ja: あなたは他の犬と違うわね

translation.en: Yeah, I… I've been hearing that a lot lately.
translation.ja: 最近 よく言われるよ

translation.en: [Marmaduke] So that's my rags-to-riches, happily-ever-after, Cinderella story.
translation.ja: 負け犬だった俺の成功物語は これで終了だ

translation.en: No more plot twists, darkest hours, or agonies of defeat.
translation.ja: どんでん返しも 敗北の苦悩もないぞ

translation.en: So could I please have some of that bacon pizza now?
translation.ja: そろそろ ベーコンピザをくれない？

translation.en: ♪ He's got a big heart Big love ♪
translation.ja: 大きな心に大きな愛 　　大物で笑顔もビッグ
大きな心に大きな愛 　　大物で笑顔もビッグ マーマデューク

translation.en: [rapping] ♪ I'm the biggest dog around ♪ ♪ The Greatest Dane In the whole darn town ♪
translation.ja: 俺は町で一番巨大な 　　　　グレートデンだ
でも家族は分かってない

translation.en: ♪ I gotta eat It's my command ♪
♪ Now, I love my family Yes, I do ♪
translation.ja: 愛する家族は 　　俺をイカれた犬扱い

translation.en: ♪ But sometimes they think That I'm crazy too ♪
translation.ja: 愛する家族は 　　俺をイカれた犬扱い 愛する家族は 　　俺をイカれた犬扱い 原作マンガ 「マーマデューク」

translation.en: ♪ There's just no if, ands, or buts ♪
translation.ja: 原作マンガ 「マーマデューク」 原作マンガ 「マーマデューク」 ただ餌を見ると 　　興奮しちまうんだ ただ餌を見ると 　　興奮しちまうんだ

translation.en: ♪ But when I see food I kinda go nuts! ♪
translation.ja: ただ餌を見ると 　　興奮しちまうんだ

translation.en: ♪ I try to be cool But then I lose it ♪ ♪ If I don't eat, I have a fit! ♪
translation.ja: 冷静にはなれない 　　食べなきゃイラつく
マーマデュークと 　　　　一緒に歌おう

translation.en: ♪ Then there's cats I gotta chase them ♪
♪ It's a dog's job It's my description ♪
♪ Cars and bugs Postman and a cat ♪
translation.ja: 猫 虫 郵便局員 　　何でも追い回し

translation.en: ♪ I chase them all And then I sleep on my mat ♪
translation.ja: 猫 虫 郵便局員 　　何でも追い回し マットで就寝

translation.en: ♪ I sleep all day ♪ ♪ I sleep all night ♪
♪ Don't wake up until the morning light ♪
♪ And then it starts all over again ♪ ♪ I just get hungry and it never ends! ♪
translation.ja: そして１日が始まり 　　また延々と腹が減る
マーマデュークと 　　　　一緒に歌おう
マーマデュークと 　　　　一緒に歌おう ワンワン！

translation.en: ♪ Now this is my life, as you can see ♪
♪ And I live with the Winslow family ♪
translation.ja: ウィンスロー家の一員さ

translation.en: ♪ I don't want money And I don't want fame ♪
translation.ja: カネも名声も要らない

translation.en: ♪ I just want love 'Cause that's the name of the game! ♪

translation.ja: 〝複数の映画に出演〞 マーマデュークと 　　　　一緒に歌おう マーマデュークと 　　　　一緒に歌おう
マーマデュークと 　　　　一緒に歌おう 〝テイク１〞 〝テイク１〞 〝テイク１〞 ワンワン！ ワンワン！
